short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share the screen from your computer in a video conversation, to show presentations, photos and documents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share the screen from your computer in a video conversation, to show presentations, photos and documents. 

This extension lets you share your screen with other participants in an arvia.chat room, so you can hold efficient online meetings. 

Install it to share the screen from your computer in a video conversation, to show presentations, photos and documents.

- Select which window/application or Chrome tab to share from your computer
- Handles multiple screens/monitors

arvia.chat lets you start a video conversation with anyone right in the browser, without the need to download and install anything, or register an account. Invite up to 4 people to a video conversation just by sending them a link.
